tool.name: Fasta Rename/Replace ID
tool.description: rename the fasta sequence in the record

param.label: New name for the fasta sequence
param.name: positional_2

tool.help:
**What it does**
Given a fasta input like
::
>NODE_REALLY_UGLY_NAME_COV_1231123081293192783912873912873 ACTG...
This tool will replace the sequence ID and produce something nicer:
::
>phage_Caitlin ACTG...
**Notes**
You may only have ONE sequence in your fasta file. More/fewer will result in failure
